Hello, I'm Cathy.

I'm a UX Researcher and Designer based in the Boston area with over 3 years of experience. I have a Master’s in Design Engineering from Harvard University and have worked at Harvard University and WalkyDoggy Inc. I specialize in creating intuitive and inclusive digital experiences.

SafeStep

Enhancing post-rideshare navigation for visually impaired users

Base

Detecting real-time water contamination with a sensor

Exploring Native American Quilting Aesthetics

Visualizing the evolution and cultural significance of Native American quilts

Michigan Language Center Korean Website Design

Enhancing the web experience for non-native English speakers
